main event: A brilliant yellowish-gold object was sighted above mountains in Guatemala traveling at a very high speed.
interesting points: The object was observed for a very brief duration of 2 seconds., The object was reported to have traveled at approximately 1500 mph., The object disappeared behind some mountains during the observation., A US Air Force Captain reported witnessing a circular metallic object that was erratic in its motion., The sighting involved a combination of military personnel and civilian witnesses.
witness description: US Air Force Captain and other military officers, as well as several Guatemalan civilians
